message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise.
I'm not willing to accept such a small share. I'll make a counteroffer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. This is my best offer so far.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I think this is a fair compromise. Let's wrap it up.
Alright, I'll take it. It's not my best deal, but I'm tired of negotiating.
